hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e -v CLANG_VERSION=6.0 umask 0022
echo "Cleanup previous build" rm -rf rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu reports/ /tmp/scan-build-*
echo "Cleanup" ./mach clobber
export MACH_NO_WRITE_TIMES=on
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug # --disable-unified-compilation ac_add_options --enable-warnings-as-errors
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j20" EOF
echo "Apply patches on top of the hg repo" hg qpop -a hg qpush -a export PATH=$PATH:/var/lib/jenkins/.cargo/bin/ echo "Build using scan-build" scan-build-$CLANG_VERSION --show-description -enable-checker optin.performance.Padding -analyzer-config stable-report-filename=true -v ./mach --log-no-times build -v
echo "Retrieve the last scan-build (-o of scan-build is failing)" SCAN_BUILD_DIR=$(ls -1d /tmp/scan-build-*|tail -1) mkdir -p reports/
echo "Move it" mv $SCAN_BUILD_DIR reports/fx-scan-build
echo "Set correct permissions" chmod o+r reports/fx-scan-build/*
echo "Send it" rsync -arv -R reports/fx-scan-build/ sylvestre@batou.ecranbleu.org:/home/www/sylvestre.ledru.info/ ./mach clobber
rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu reports/fx-scan-build/
